QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Townlong Steppes!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Taran Zhu in Townlong Steppes.
The Shado-Pan want to reclaim their land from the clutches of the yaungol, but lack the numbers to do so.
Assist them with their assault against the yaungol.
Glory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Taran Zhu in Townlong Steppes.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Taran Zhu in Townlong Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText:
Welcome to Townlong Steppes, outsider.
If you insist on wandering in to the darkest places of Pandaria then far be it from me to not put you to good use.
